item.title: Bad Company - Ready For Love
item.description:
Walkin’ down
this rocky road
Wondering where
my life is leadin’
Rollin’ on
to the bitter end
Finding out
along the way
What it takes
to keep love living
You should know
how it feels my friend
Woo I want you to stay
woo I want you today
I’m ready for love
Oh baby
I’m ready for love
ready for love

I’m ready for love

for your love-
Now I’m on my feet
again
Better things
are bound to happen
All my dues
surely must be paid
Many miles
and many tears
Times we had but
now they’re changing
You should know
that I’m not afraid
Woo I want you to stay
woo I want you today
I’m ready for love
